Package simulation.builder

Interface Summary
IXMLObjectBuilder Interface for all parts of the world builder
IXMLRoadSegmentBuilder Factory class for the road segments
IXMLWayPointBuilder The way point builder
IXMLWorldBuilder World Builder This unit reads the world from the XML and builds it
 

Class Summary
LaneBuilder Some helper methods to build lanes
XMLJunctionBuilder The builder class for junctions
XMLLaneBuilder Abstract class for lane builders
XMLLeftLaneBuilder Builder for the left lanes
XMLObjectBuilder The top class for all builder classes
XMLRightLaneBuilder Builder for the right lane
XMLRoadBuilder Builder for the roads
XMLRoadSegmentBuilder  
XMLSpeedWayPointBuilder Builder for speed way points Currently not in use due to missing time
XMLWayPointBuilder  
XMLWayPointBuilderFactory Way point factory
XMLWorldBuilder This is implemented as a Singleton, because it is used several times all over the place and it would be required to pass down the instance quite often
 

Enum Summary
XMLLaneBuilder.directionType The available directions for the factory
XMLWayPointBuilderFactory.direction The possible directions for way points
 

Exception Summary
InvalidXMLException Exception if the XML file contains invalid definitions
